problems.title: Sum of Digits (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given a non-negative integer N, compute the sum of its digits using recursion.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print the sum of digits of N.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
1234

Sample Output
10

Sample Input
0

Sample Output
0
hintsList: Base case: if n == 0 return 0. Recursive case: (n % 10) + sumDigits(n / 10).
